page.title: 20MEDIA:DOMESDAY PROJECT.
page.content: In this brief survey undertaken by the Junior children of Clapham C of E school we have only been able to outline some of the village activites and attractions,nor yet mention the migration of the local population to find work and the influx of others who commute to various towns and cities.Perhaps our Domesday 1986 survey of Clapham-cum-Newby with its rocky hills where clouds often cleave,and the 'beer brown beck'brawls to the valleys below will encourage you who see this to come and find out more. The participants in this project were: Pip Mallaband,Mike Carr,Jean Close, Jean Procter,Si Coultherd,Sara Walker ,Mat Whittfield,Mat Smith,Martin Campbell,Clare Mason,Heidi Dodsworth, George Stavely,Jim Bradshaw,Andy+Lucy Kelly,Steve Ellershaw,Mary Dawson.
